name: reddit de clutter
description:
Take away some of the clutter in the reddit design and focus on content.

Current features: 

- Works, also on subreddits with custom style.
- Plays nice with res (except for night mode, will fix that later).
- Better listing, ordering of elements.
- Titles brought into focus.
- Lower opacity on elements that do not need main focus. 
- Max height for thumbnails. 
- Thumbnails to the right.

todo:

additional_info: Still trying out what works best, so style is subject to change.
